row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_FILE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Include all" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_ALL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Human readable" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_HUMAN# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Local only" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_LOCAL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Limit to type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_UNIX_EXCLUDE#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 ! check for leading EXT: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_FILE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Include all" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_ALL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Human readable" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_HUMAN# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Local only" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_LOCAL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Limit to type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_UNIX_EXCLUDE#
errors=0 :IF &UC4RB_UNIX_FILE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_UNIX_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path to directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source '&UC4RB_UNIX_FILE#' is not a directory or doesn't exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 fi :ENDIF if [ "$errors" -gt "0" ]; then exit $errors fi
human= all= local= limit= exclude= path= cmd=df
:IF &UC4RB_UNIX_FILE# <> "" path="&UC4RB_UNIX_FILE#" :ENDIF
:SET &OS_TYPE# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_SW', &AGENT#)
:IF &OS_TYPE# = "AIX" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Human Readable parameter isn't supported by AIX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Include All parameter isn't supported by AIX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Local Only parameter isn't supported by AIX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Limit to Type parameter isn't supported by AIX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Exclude Type parameter isn't supported by AIX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! echo "Warning: -h isn't supported by AIX!" ! echo "Warning: -a isn't supported by AIX!" ! echo "Warning: -l isn't supported by AIX!" ! echo "Warning: -t isn't supported by AIX!" ! echo "Warning: -x isn't supported by AIX!" :ENDIF
:IF &OS_TYPE# = "HP-UX" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Human Readable option isn't supported by HP-UX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Include All parameter isn't supported by HP-UX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Exclude Type parameter isn't supported by HP-UX!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! echo "Warning: -h isn't supported by HP-UX!" ! echo "Warning: -a isn't supported by HP-UX!" ! echo "Warning: -x isn't supported by HP-UX!"
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LOCAL# = "YES" local=-l : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO# <> "" limit=" -F &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO#" : ENDIF
:ENDIF
:IF &OS_TYPE# = "SunOS" cmd=/usr/xpg4/bin/df : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Exclude Type parameter isn't supported by SunOS!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! echo "Warning: -x isn't supported by SunOS!"
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_HUMAN# = "YES" human=-h : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_ALL# = "YES" all=-a : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LOCAL# = "YES" local=-l : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO# <> "" limit=" -F &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &OS_TYPE# = "Linux"
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_HUMAN# = "YES" human=-h : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_ALL# = "YES" all=-a : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LOCAL# = "YES" local=-l : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO# <> "" limit=" -t &UC4RB_UNIX_LIMIT_TO#" : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_UNIX_EXCLUDE# <> "" exclude="-x &UC4RB_UNIX_EXCLUDE#" : ENDIF
:ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "### begin disk space output ###" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:IF &OS_TYPE# = "SunOS" $cmd -Pk $all $human $local $limit $exclude "$path" | nawk '{if (NR!=1) {sub(/%/, "", $5); printf("%-20s : %-20s : %-20s : %-20s : %-40s : %s\n",$1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6)}}' :ELSE $cmd -Pk $all $human $local $limit $exclude "$path" | awk '{if (NR!=1) {sub(/%/, "", $5); printf("%-20s : %-20s : %-20s : %-20s : %-40s : %s\n",$1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6)}}' :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "### end disk space output ###" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO

row.post_process: :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.VARA.TEMP.GET_DISK_SPACE_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &output# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_OUT_FREE_SPACE# = "" !:SET &df# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*", "COL=LENGTH", "LENGTH_TAB='21=Filesystem,21=Size,21=Used,21=Available,21=Use%,40=Mountpoint'") :SET &df# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*", "COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER= : ") :PROCESS &df# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#) : IF STR_FIND(&line#, "### end disk space output ###") > 0 : SET &output# = 0 : ENDIF : IF &output# = 1 : SET &dev# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 1) : SET &size# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 2) : SET &used# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 3) : SET &avail# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 4) : SET &percent# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 5) : SET &mount# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&df#, 6) : PUT_VAR &variableName#, &dev#, &size#, &used#, &avail#, &percent#, &mount# : IF &UC4RB_OUT_FREE_SPACE# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_FREE_SPACE# = STR_TRIM(&avail#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF STR_FIND(&line#, "### begin disk space output ###") > 0 : SET &output# = 1 : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_DISK_SPACE# = "&variableName#"
